title: Heaven Knows What. Official Movie Trailer #1 [HD] (2015)
description:
In theaters: May 29th, 2015

Description:

Harley loves Ilya. He gives her life purpose and sets her passion ablaze. So, when he asks her to prove her love by slitting her wrists, she obliges with only mild hesitation, perhaps because of her other all-consuming love: heroin. Directed by celebrated filmmakers Josh and Benny Safdie (Lenny Cooke, Daddy Longlegs), Heaven Knows What blends fiction, formalism and raw vÃƒÂ©ritÃƒÂ© as it follows a young heroin addict (Arielle Holmes) who finds mad love in the streets of New York.
